name: Rail Wars! Karuizawa Yori Satsui wo Nosete
summary: Rail Wars! Karuizawa Yori Satsui wo Nosete is an upcoming Japanese visual novel based on the Rail Wars! light novel franchise. The series takes place in an alternate version of Japan where the nationalized railway system was never privatized. Naoto Takayama is an ordinary high school student who aspires to a comfortable life working at Japanese National Railways. He ends up working as a security force trainee, where he unwillingly has to deal with his strange colleagues as well as RJ, a group of extremists who are fighting to privatize the railway. The game was initially planned for a 2014 release, but was delayed indefinitely.
